DOC.brief_summary: The study is designed to evaluate and compare the efficacy and cost effectiveness of 3 smoking cessation treatments with HIV-positive cigarette smokers. The treatments include face-to-face individual counseling, a computer-Internet-based self-help treatment and a self-help manual treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Smoking Treatment in HIV Clinical Care Settings
DOC.criteria: HIV positive 18 years or older smoking "most days" during the past month must be able to read English any contraindications for overthecounter nicotine replacement treatment active psychotic symptoms severe cognitive deficits/dementia
